---
description: A dark theme for the Bit design language
labels: ['bit', 'theme', 'design', 'dark', 'design tokens']
---

import { DarkTheme } from './dark-theme';

Dark theme values for our [Bit theming system](https://bit.dev/teambit/design/ui/theme/base-theme).

### Component usage

```js
<DarkTheme>
  <div>...</div>
</DarkTheme>
```

### Render a component in dark

<DarkTheme style={{ padding: 8 }}>Hello world!</DarkTheme>
